templeHalls.explanation: If I see a SNAKE, say 'whee' to jump over it! If I see BLOW DARTS, say 'woah' to duck. And hey, if we spot some COINS lying around before the treasure room, say 'grab' to pick them up!
Bad news! The SWING AXE traps are working now! Say 'woah' to not lose your hair, or worse!
There are some ROLLING ROCK booby traps now! Shout 'whee' to jump and not get flattened like a pancake!

treasureTombs.explanation: Those FLOOR SPIKES are still very pointy! Say 'whee' to hop over them!
The ground doens't look very stable up ahead! If we get to a COLLAPSING FLOOR, shout 'whee' to jump over!
Eww, there are a lot of thick SPIDER WEBS coming! Use your whip to break them by shouting 'whip!'

templeEscape.explanation: There are ARROWS up ahead! Say 'woah' to get down!
I think some big jungle cats got into the temple! If we find a JAGUAR, shout 'whip' to keep them back with a whip I found.
There are nasty POISON GAS booby traps around here! Say 'whoa' to duck under and not breath it in!

outToSea.explanation: If we see underwater COINS, say mine to pull them up. If we see rocks or a whirlpool up ahead, say TURN to avoid them. Remember to say a friendly 'Ahoy' to to SAILORS so they don't attack us!
MERMAIDS live around here! Say 'ahoy' to be nice to them, otherwise they might think we're pirates!
I think there are some BARREL BOMBS floating in these waters. Shout 'turn' To avoid them!

perilousWaters.explanation: There be evil PIRATES in these waters! Shout 'boom' to shoot the cannons at them!
I'm afraid the PIRATE QUEEN is after us! Say 'boom' to keep her away with our cannons!
Lots of SHIPWRECKS around here! Say WEE to speed through the broken pieces!

shipwreckBay.explanation: BIG WAVES coming up! Say 'wee' to speed up and get over the wave!
See that? It's a giant SEA SNAKE is trying to get our ship. Shout 'foom' to fight it off with a harpoon.
They say the legendary KRAKEN is back! If we spot it, shout 'foom' to keep it away with a giant harpoon!

theVillage.explanation: Say 'mine' to grab COINS. The the thief runs into a WALL, shout 'climb'. If he falls into a MOAT, say 'swim'.
The sneaky thief thinks he can slow us down with TOMATOES. Say 'woah' to dodge them!
The thief asked his BANDIT friends to help him get away! Stop them with my magic wand by shouting 'zap'!

castleGrounds.explanation: There are thorny ROSE BUSHES around here! Say 'whee' to jump over them and not get pricked!
Careful! I think BABY DUCKS like playing in this area! Say 'whee' to jump over them!
King Max said hungry TROLLS now roam these lands! Say 'hide' to find a good hiding spot when one is near!

dragonAttack.explanation: I can't believe it! A DRAGON in the sky! Shout 'hide' to take cover when it comes by.
Now the thief is going to throw BEEHIVES at us! Shout 'woah' to dodge them and not get stung!
Now the thief's GOBLIN minions are helping him! No problem though because you can say 'zap' to knock them away.
